name: taco nosebleed
description:
hi this is a new game i made last weekend i think. its pretty good for a gmae i made in like an hour i guess. its a top down shooter rouge-lite where u bleed on tacos. its hard for the wrong reasons but still kind of fun once you figure out the tricks.

heres all the controls you need to know

wasd move; click fire; r restart

good luck, you'll need it

concept by """big D."""

design by """big D.""" and UncleDoug

art by UncleDoug

programming by UncleDoug

music by the irate gamer
